name: Cube Bros
description:
Welcome To Cube Bros! A game where two cube brothers move together or die together! If the brothers venture on too far apart for too long, a beautiful explosion will come to be.

There are 7 levels! Each one gets a bit more difficult as you progress.

You can control one Cube Bro at a time and move with WASD or Arrow Keys. Use R to quickly restart and "Space" to switch between brothers.

All art assets were purchased on unreal market place. Sounds from:

https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/jazzy-frenchy

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/

100% of the code and gameplay was coded within the Game Jam! 48 hours!

Team

* Wabasi - Game Design, Level Design and Sound

* CodingCoop - Programmer

* Acwel - Level Designer

* Sussy-Chan - Chief Motivation Officer
